name: premake-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Premake is a command line utility which reads a scripted definition of a
software project, then uses it to perform build configuration tasks or
generate project files for toolsets like Visual Studio, Xcode, and GNU
Make. Premake's scripts are little Lua programs, so the sky's the limit!

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
